title: Mexican breakfast tortillas with avocado
description: Add some Mexican flavour to your morning with this breakfast recipe; tortillas topped with scrambled eggs, avocado, chilli, spring onions and tomatoes.

method.Step 1: Heat the tortillas in a hot pan until golden, then remove. Melt the butter in the pan, then add the chilli, spring onions and chopped tomatoes.

method.Step 2: In a bowl, whisk the eggs, season, then add to the pan, stirring until the eggs are just cooked. Divide among the tortillas and serve with the avocados, chopped fresh coriander and lime wedges.
